definition: to follow/to abide by/to comply with/compliance
to observe/to obey/to follow/to comply with
to follow/to adhere to/to abide by

sentences.english: Another company I follow is Pediment Gold.
sentences.chinese: 另一家公司是山花我遵循黄金。

sentences.english: Follow the approach outlined in this article to avoid this pitfall.
sentences.chinese: 通过遵循本文给出的方法可以避免这个失误。

sentences.english: This best practice should still be followed.
sentences.chinese: 这个可靠实践方法仍然需要遵循。

sentences.english: When you go to a new school, you don't know the ground rules of how you are supposed to behave.
sentences.chinese: 当你进入一所新学校，常常不知道有何遵循的规矩。

sentences.english: We rarely think to question the financialconcepts we believe in and follow.—Garrett B. Gunderson, Killing Sacred Cows
sentences.chinese: 我们几乎不去质疑自己相信和遵循的理财观念。

sentences.english: They didn't develop those habits of mind by following mandated curricula.
sentences.chinese: 他们没有开发这些头脑的思维习惯强制遵循课程。

sentences.english: The therapy programs in the double-blinded trial and open-label trail are the same.
sentences.chinese: 开放试验和双盲试验遵循同一研究方案。

sentences.english: As usual, the code will be released under an open source license.
sentences.chinese: 照常，代码将遵循开放源码许可证发布。

sentences.english: Much could be gained by creating an international network of websites committed to such principles.
sentences.chinese: 创建一个遵循这些原则的国际互联网站获益颇丰。

sentences.english: Pirate crews followed a set of rules called the Code of Conduct.
sentences.chinese: 海盗成员遵循着一套叫做“行为法典”的规则。

sentences.english: Protestants and Jews have different ones.
sentences.chinese: 新教徒和犹太人则遵循另一部。

sentences.english: To legslate involuntary dangerous conduct criminally should follow four necessary principles.
sentences.chinese: 过失危险行为犯罪化应遵循必要的四个原则。

sentences.english: They still rely on this principle today, incidentally.
sentences.chinese: 巧的是今天苹果依然遵循这个原则。

sentences.english: This lets you follow the naming convention that best fits your application.
sentences.chinese: 这允许您遵循最适合您的应用程序的命名约定。

sentences.english: Design constraints indicate anything unique in a customer environment to which the portal will need to conform.
sentences.chinese: 设计限制表示门户需要遵循的客户环境中的特殊要求。

definition: to comply with/to follow (directives)/to defer (to the judgment of superiors)
to comply with/to abide by/to respect (an agreement)
according to/in accordance with/in the light of/on the basis of
to go against/to be contrary to/to violate
rule (e.g. of science)/law of behavior/regular pattern/rhythm/discipline
in keeping with/in accordance with/tallying with/in line with/to agree with/to accord with/to conform to/to correspond with/to manage/to handle
to take orders/to receive commands/to carry on (a tradition)
